pullRequest.title: Fixes docker benchmark
pullRequest.bodyText:
A recent behavior which I think will be addressed in testcontainers 15 final is
if you leave out the docker tag, all tags will be pulled. This creates a hung
scenario, which the commit here fixes. It also moves to our new standard images.

commit.message:
Fixes docker benchmark

A recent behavior which I think will be addressed in testcontainers 15 final is
if you leave out the docker tag, all tags will be pulled. This creates a hung
scenario, which the commit here fixes. It also moves to our new standard images.

nodes.bodyText: note: this uses the smaller and less likely to die armeria variant
